desc: Sustainable and ethical womenswear, focused on gym, yoga, pilates and activewear for women. Versatile for performance and comfort with flattering fits for all shapes and sizes - from XXS to XXL (and XS, S, M, L, XL. Recycled fabric certified OKEO-TEX, designed in UK, manufactured in Bali.

layout.text: New styles, new fabric and new lengths.
